resources.string: Tap your name to see more statistics
GET BONUS POINTS BY WALKING, RUNNING, TILTING OR TAKING TRANSPORT!
tap your name to see more statistics
tap a name to delete or press back button

This game is designed to improve your typing performace.

 In the background it recognizes what are you doing during the game:
 sitting, walking, tilting, running or using transport.


You have to type words as fast as you can.

 You can challenge other players and get more points by moving yourself during the game.





Game was made by Daniil Rabizo.
